summary: Activity heartbeat options are duplicated in the API documentation, appearing twice on the same documentation page. This suggests a potential documentation generation or configuration issue.
userImpact: Users are confused by redundant documentation entries for the same heartbeat functionality.
rootCause: Documentation generation process may have a bug causing duplicate entries, or the source configuration has duplicate definitions.
resolutionDetails: Documentation duplication issue was resolved through fix to documentation generation or source configuration.
keyQuote: is this a symptom that something is wrong?
